verses.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Give thanks to the LORD, because he is good — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;
verses.ct: Let everyone the LORD has rescued say this — those he has freed from the grip of the enemy.

verses.kjv: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.
verses.ct: He brought them together from distant lands — from east and west, from north and south.

verses.kjv: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.
verses.ct: They wandered through the desert with no path to follow; they couldn't find a city to settle in.

verses.kjv: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.
verses.ct: Hungry and thirsty, their soul grew faint inside them.

verses.kjv: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.
verses.ct: Then they called out to the LORD in their desperation, and he rescued them from their suffering.

verses.kjv: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.
verses.ct: He guided them along the right path so they could reach a city where they could live.

verses.kjv: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
verses.ct: If only people would praise the LORD for his goodness and for his amazing deeds for humanity!

verses.kjv: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.
verses.ct: He satisfies the longing soul and fills the hungry soul with good things.

verses.kjv: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron;
verses.ct: Some sat in darkness and deep gloom, prisoners suffering in iron chains,

verses.kjv: Because they rebelled against the words of God, and contemned the counsel of the most High:
verses.ct: because they had rebelled against what God said and rejected the guidance of the Most High.

verses.kjv: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour; they fell down, and there was none to help.
verses.ct: So he crushed their spirit with hard labor; they collapsed, and no one was there to help.

verses.kjv: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.
verses.ct: Then they called out to the LORD in their desperation, and he saved them from their suffering.

verses.kjv: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their bands in sunder.
verses.ct: He pulled them out of darkness and deep gloom and tore their chains apart.

verses.kjv: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
verses.ct: If only people would praise the LORD for his goodness and for his amazing deeds for humanity!

verses.kjv: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.
verses.ct: He has shattered bronze gates and cut through iron bars.

verses.kjv: Fools because of their transgression, and because of their iniquities, are afflicted.
verses.ct: Some became fools through their rebellion, and their sins brought them misery.

verses.kjv: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat; and they draw near unto the gates of death.
verses.ct: Their soul rejected every kind of food, and they came close to the edge of death.

verses.kjv: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saveth them out of their distresses.
verses.ct: Then they called out to the LORD in their desperation, and he saved them from their suffering.

verses.kjv: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
verses.ct: He sent his word and healed them, snatching them away from destruction.

verses.kjv: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
verses.ct: If only people would praise the LORD for his goodness and for his amazing deeds for humanity!

verses.kjv: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.
verses.ct: Let them offer sacrifices of thanksgiving and tell about what he has done with joyful singing.

verses.kjv: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;
verses.ct: Some went out on the sea in ships, conducting trade across the vast waters.

verses.kjv: These see the works of the LORD, and his wonders in the deep.
verses.ct: They witnessed the works of the LORD and his wonders in the ocean depths.

verses.kjv: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.
verses.ct: He spoke, and a fierce wind rose up, lifting the waves high.

verses.kjv: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.
verses.ct: The sailors were tossed up toward the heavens and plunged back down into the depths; their soul melted with terror.

verses.kjv: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wit’s end.
verses.ct: They stumbled and swayed like drunken people, and all their skill was useless.

verses.kjv: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.
verses.ct: Then they called out to the LORD in their desperation, and he brought them out of their suffering.

verses.kjv: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.
verses.ct: He calmed the storm to a whisper, and the waves went still.

verses.kjv: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.
verses.ct: They were overjoyed when it grew quiet, and he guided them to the harbor they had been hoping for.

verses.kjv: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
verses.ct: If only people would praise the LORD for his goodness and for his amazing deeds for humanity!

verses.kjv: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
verses.ct: Let them honor him in the gathering of the people and praise him in the council of the elders.

verses.kjv: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;
verses.ct: He turns rivers into desert and flowing springs into parched ground,

verses.kjv: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.
verses.ct: and productive land into a salt waste, because of the wickedness of those who live there.

verses.kjv: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
verses.ct: He turns desert into pools of water and dry ground into flowing springs.

verses.kjv: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;
verses.ct: There he settles the hungry, and they build a city to live in.

verses.kjv: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.
verses.ct: They plant fields and vineyards that produce an abundant harvest.

verses.kjv: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.
verses.ct: He blesses them so that their numbers grow greatly, and he doesn't let their livestock decline.

verses.kjv: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.
verses.ct: But then they shrink in number and are brought low through oppression, trouble, and grief.

verses.kjv: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness, where there is no way.
verses.ct: He pours disgrace on rulers and makes them wander in a trackless wasteland.

verses.kjv: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh him families like a flock.
verses.ct: Yet he lifts the poor out of their suffering and makes their families as numerous as flocks.

verses.kjv: The righteous shall see it, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.
verses.ct: Those who do right will see this and celebrate, while every wicked person will be silenced.

verses.kjv: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.
verses.ct: Whoever is wise should pay attention to these things — they will come to understand the faithful love of the LORD.
